triplets: Starchy tuber vegetable from the nightshade family
Boiling, baking, frying, mashing, and as ingredient in countless dishes
Starchy flesh, skin, and sometimes sprouts or eyes
Skin, flesh, eyes (buds), and sometimes sprouts
Brown, yellow, red, or purple skin; white or yellow flesh
Global agriculture, staple food crops, and culinary traditions
